mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_NO as DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NO != '3' ORDER BY DEPT_NO

SELECT U.USER_NO as USER_NO , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , U.EMAIL as EMAIL , U.PHONE as PHONE , R.RANK_NO as RANK_NO , R.RANK_NAME as RANK_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME FROM T_USER U JOIN T_RANK R ON U.RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO JOIN T_DEPT D ON U.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE U.DEPT_NO = #{deptNo} AND U.USER_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY U.RANK_NO DESC, U.USER_NAME

SELECT U.USER_NO as USER_NO , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , U.EMAIL as EMAIL , U.PHONE as PHONE , D.DEPT_NO as DEPT_NO , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME FROM T_USER U JOIN T_DEPT D ON U.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE U.RANK_NO = #{rankNo} AND U.USER_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY D.DEPT_NO, U.USER_NAME

SELECT U.USER_NO as USER_NO , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , U.USER_ID as USER_ID , U.EMAIL as EMAIL , U.PHONE as PHONE , U.ADDRESS as ADDRESS , U.HIRE_DATE as HIRE_DATE , U.PROFILE_URL as PROFILE_URL , R.RANK_NO as RANK_NO , R.RANK_NAME as RANK_NAME , D.DEPT_NO as DEPT_NO , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME FROM T_USER U JOIN T_RANK R ON U.RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO JOIN T_DEPT D ON U.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND U.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND U.USER_STATUS = 'Y'
